Title: Relates to establishing a county representation system for electing the governor and lieutenant-governor within the state
Summary: Establishes a county representation system for electing the governor and lieutenant-governor within the state.
LawCode: Amd Art 4 ยง1, add Art 4 ยง1-a, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 1 of article 4 of the constitution, in relation to establishing a county representation system for electing the governor and lieutenant-governor within the state
